remarks: The norm of the difference between two elements.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
statement:
nmf.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
nmf.n $e |- N = ( norm ` G ) $.
nmmtri.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
nmsub $p |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` ( A .- B ) ) = ( N ` ( B .- A ) ) ) $.
